input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Creates a new entry for database information Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>create-discovery-entry</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <databaseinfo> <address>172.16.49.111</address> <managementaddress>172.16.49.111</managementaddress> <server>172.16.49.111</server> <port>1522</port> <type>oracle</type> </databaseinfo> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is created here. databaseinfo[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application database is created here. address[Required] IP/DNS Name of the host server. managementaddress[Optional] IP/DNS Name of the management server. server[Required] IP address of the database server. port[Required] Port on which database is listening. type[Required] Database type.Valid values are - oracle/sybase/sql/cache
2. Creates a new entry for the exchange domain controller Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>create-discovery-entry</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <domaincontrollerinfo> <domain>bmccat.com</domain> <username>Administrator</username> <password>root123</password> <domaincontroller>bmccat.com</domaincontroller> </domaincontrollerinfo> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is created here. domaincontrollerinfo[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application domaincontroller is created here. domain[Required] Name of the new domain controller username[Required] Username of the domain controller password[Required] Password of the domain controller domaincontroller[Required] Domain of the new domain controller.
3. Creates a new entry for the TNSLinstenerPort Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>create-discovery-entry</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <tnslistenerport>1111</tnslistenerport> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is created here. tnslistenerport[Required] Port for which the new entry will be created.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Creates a new entry for database information. 2. Creates a new entry for the exchange domain controller. The -primary tag is required if the domain controller is primary. 3. Creates a new entry for the Oracle TNS Listener Port.
